text:
The Rosenstock-Huessy Lecture Fund
Mr. Frank Schooley
119 Gregory Hall
Urbana , Illinois
Dear Mr, Schooley,
On February 19, Mr. Skornia wrote me that he
had turned my proposal of February 14 over to you and
your Radio Program Planning Committee for deliberation.
I hope you have not forgotten that proposal and
that we would very much like to contribute to the
NASB in its work.
Your8 truly
Box 724
